actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that remarriage of the surviving spouse of a veteran after age sixty shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.

summary.text: Provides that remarriage of a veteran's surviving spouse after age 60 shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that remarriage of the surviving spouse of a veteran after age sixty shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.
